mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into buyer_task_detail( buyer_task_no, item_code, upc, max_price, start_time, end_time, mode, sku_code, remark, max_count, sku_pic_url, creator, modifier, company_no ) VALUES
( #{detail.buyerTaskNo}, #{detail.itemCode}, #{detail.upc}, #{detail.maxPrice}, #{detail.startTime}, #{detail.endTime}, #{detail.mode}, #{detail.skuCode}, #{detail.remark}, #{detail.maxCount}, #{detail.skuPicUrl}, #{detail.creator}, #{detail.modifier}, #{detail.companyNo} )
